title: Example Post 1
preview: Here is the first blog post that has been created. The aim of this page is to give people more generic advice that isn't specific to only certain individuals.
html:
Example Post 1 - The blog system


These blogs exist to spread advice to the masses without needing to contact everyone individually. While the 'Contact us' page can be used for people to ask you for help, this system effectively lets you give widespread help to anyone who uses the site.

With the ability to add your own HTML to these posts, you could include:

  • Bullet point lists
  • Images
  • Links
  • Or basically anything else!

So go wild with it, and experiment to see what is possible.
